badge_thumb.title: QR Badge creator
badge_thumb.desc: This simple application allow users to create and print badges with data codified in a qr code

json_csv_thumb.title: Json|Csv Converter
json_csv_thumb.desc: This tool do exactly what it is supposed to do: it converts files from json format to csv and viceversa

mep_vote_mapper_client.title: Check the vote
mep_vote_mapper_client.desc: This is the client used to interact with the data provided from Mep Vote Mapper server. it allow users to visualize what each mep voted for each votation

mep_vote_mapper.title: Mep Vote Mapper
mep_vote_mapper.desc: This is a server that collect data about EU Parliament's plenary votations and, once clean and organized, store them in a database. It also allows to manage data through a raw interface

meteor_landing.title: Meteor Landing map
meteor_landing.desc: A data viz project (part of FCC curriculum) that displays data about biggest meteorite impacts on earth

global_surface_temp.title: Global Surface Variation
global_surface_temp.desc: A data viz project (part of FCC curriculum) that squeeze a lot of data about earth land-surface historical temperature in a very compact and intuitive view
